nodes.text: The Leisure Fields was a location beyond Derso-4 of the Outer Rim Territories. The Fields were home to a species known as Smapp.

The Leisure Fields was mentioned in a one-page cooking recipe titled "Cooking a Smapp", written by Bob Carrau for the 1993 book Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a publication that collects concept designs and photographs from various George Lucas projects. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
